mapper.insert: insert into mkt_resource (MKT_RES_ID, MKT_RES_NBR, MKT_RES_TYPE_ID, MKT_RES_EXTTYPE_ID, MKT_MKT_RES_ID, MKT_RES_NAME, MKT_RES_DESC, MKT_PRICING_PLAN_ID, UNIT, ORDERED_FLAG, MANAGE_REGION_ID, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, STATUS_DATE, STATUS_CD, REMARK, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE) values (#{mktResId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mktResNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mktResTypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mktResExttypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mktMktResId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mktResName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mktResDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mktPricingPlanId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderedFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manageRegionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update mkt_resource set MKT_RES_NBR = #{mktResNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MKT_RES_TYPE_ID = #{mktResTypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MKT_RES_EXTTYPE_ID = #{mktResExttypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MKT_MKT_RES_ID = #{mktMktResId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MKT_RES_NAME = #{mktResName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MKT_RES_DESC = #{mktResDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MKT_PRICING_PLAN_ID = #{mktPricingPlanId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERED_FLAG = #{orderedFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_REGION_ID = #{manageRegionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EFF_DATE = #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXP_DATE = #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where MKT_RES_ID = #{mktResId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select MKT_RES_ID, MKT_RES_NBR, MKT_RES_TYPE_ID, MKT_RES_EXTTYPE_ID, MKT_MKT_RES_ID, MKT_RES_NAME, MKT_RES_DESC, MKT_PRICING_PLAN_ID, UNIT, ORDERED_FLAG, MANAGE_REGION_ID, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, STATUS_DATE, STATUS_CD, REMARK, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_resource where MKT_RES_ID = #{mktResId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
